meanings.definition: A person who observes the stars.
meanings.sent1: Many stargazers enjoy looking at the night sky through telescopes.
meanings.sent2: The stargazers gathered at the observatory to study the constellations.
meanings.sent3: The stargazers had a star-themed party under the twinkling night sky.
meanings.sent4: She was a stargazer, finding beauty in the vastness of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The stargazers' passion for astronomy shone brightly in their eyes.

meanings.definition: A device used for observing the stars.
meanings.sent1: The stargazers pointed their telescope towards the distant galaxies.
meanings.sent2: The new stargazers were excited to test out their powerful telescope.
meanings.sent3: The stargazers' telescope had a mind of its own, always pointing at Orion.
meanings.sent4: The stargazers' telescope was a window to the mysteries of the cosmos.
meanings.sent5: Through the lens of the stargazers' telescope, the stars seemed within reach.
